title: Leona 6.14 Q and R Auto Range Interaction
body:
I was just playing around in a custom game to get a feel on the Leona changes in this patch and noticed that the Q range increase appears to overwrite the Ult autos range increase. Both hitting Q and then R, or R and then Q sets her range to the 175 of the Q auto distance rather than the  225 of the Ult autos. Not sure if this is intended functionality, but it's kinda annoying to be whacking someone with your ult and suddenly not be able to stun them. 

Does this happen for anyone else?

replies.body:
That's strange. I would've guessed it only took the biggest bonus, like for Nasus currently between Q and R (and Renekton too?).

Taking only the smaller one is absolutely ridiculous, I'm 99% sure it's a bug, and I suggest you make a bug report there: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

Both bonus stacking would be great, but maybe *too* great and kinda OP. ^^'
Just did make a post in the bug report section!
I'd have thought the range increase on autos would stack.  I thought that was the main point of the increased auto range on her ult.
Same, but currently not the case it would seem :(
